pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: Department of Records and Information Services
pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: WNYC Subject Files, Phonodisks, Awards, Scrapbooks, 1935-1981
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Contains several types of records documenting the activities of WNYC, including administrative files, 1948-1981, public relations files, 1967-1983, publications, 1938-1984, awards and plaques, 1949-1979, LaGuardia broadcasts, 1944-1945, and six phonodisks and scrapbooks, 1926-1971.
